## OctreeNode.getLevel() method

Get the hierarchical level index of this node.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getLevel(): number;
```
**Returns:**

number

The level index of this octree node.

## Remarks

Level 0 is the root chunk; higher levels are finer subdivisions.
